docs.abstract: As episodes of online hacking have become even more startling, the company has been evolving to confront security threats and improve how information is shared.
docs.snippet: As episodes of online hacking have become even more startling, the company has been evolving to confront security threats and improve how information is shared.
docs.lead_paragraph: REDMOND, Wash. — Microsoft was once the epitome of everything wrong with security in technology. Its products were so infested with vulnerabilities that the company’s co-founder, Bill Gates, once ordered all of Microsoft engineers to stop writing new code for a month and focus on fixing the bugs in software they had already built.

headline.main: Microsoft Sheds Reputation as an Easy Mark for Hackers
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Sheds Reputation as an Easy Mark for Hackers

docs.abstract: Tips on making the elements on your computer screen easier to see, from the blinking text-insertion cursor to your desktop’s text and icons.
docs.snippet: Tips on making the elements on your computer screen easier to see, from the blinking text-insertion cursor to your desktop’s text and icons.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. When I am moving around a document on my PC, I sometimes have a hard time seeing the flashing cursor because it’s so thin. Is there a way to make it bigger?

headline.main: How to Enlarge the Text Cursor

docs.abstract: The technology research firm IDC predicts the pace of digital transformation of business is going to accelerate and increasingly hit every industry.
docs.snippet: The technology research firm IDC predicts the pace of digital transformation of business is going to accelerate and increasingly hit every industry.
docs.lead_paragraph: It is the time of year when the big technology research shops gaze into the near future to identify trends that will have the most impact on corporate America and the tech industry over the next few years.

headline.main: Digital Transformation Going Mainstream in 2016, IDC Predicts
headline.print_headline: Researchers Gaze Into the Tech Crystal Ball

docs.abstract: The security of Microsoft’s products was once a sore spot for the company. Now its executives are giving other people tips on how to keep out the bad guys.
docs.snippet: The security of Microsoft’s products was once a sore spot for the company. Now its executives are giving other people tips on how to keep out the bad guys.
docs.lead_paragraph: It was a given in the technology industry for many years that if you wanted to find a company that excelled at computer security, you ought not look for it in Redmond, Wash., the home of Microsoft.

headline.main: Daily Report: Microsoft Finds Its Security Groove

docs.abstract: As part of its switch to Windows 10 as a “service” that automatically updates itself, Microsoft has pushed out its Windows 10 November Update.
docs.snippet: As part of its switch to Windows 10 as a “service” that automatically updates itself, Microsoft has pushed out its Windows 10 November Update.

docs.abstract: Microsoft’s stock finally returned to a nominal level not seen since before the 2000 tech collapse. But without share buybacks, it might not look quite so good.
docs.snippet: Microsoft’s stock finally returned to a nominal level not seen since before the 2000 tech collapse. But without share buybacks, it might not look quite so good.
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft has been on a roll. Late last month, it did something it hadn’t pulled off since Bill Gates was chief: Its share price reached a new high.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Stock Math: Fewer Shares, Pricier Shares

docs.abstract: You can back up the an address book as a vCard file and import it back into the cloud if disaster strikes.
docs.snippet: You can back up the an address book as a vCard file and import it back into the cloud if disaster strikes.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a way to back up the contact files that I sync between my computers and iCloud?

docs.abstract: A new demonstration of the HoloLens device suggested that augmented reality has a way to go before the technology is ready for the masses.
docs.snippet: A new demonstration of the HoloLens device suggested that augmented reality has a way to go before the technology is ready for the masses.
docs.lead_paragraph: REDMOND, Wash. — Reality may be starting to catch up with augmented reality.

headline.main: A Reality Check for Microsoft’s HoloLens
headline.print_headline: A Demonstration of u2018Mixed Realityu2019 Shows Its Limits

docs.abstract: A look at how the new features in Microsoft’s latest operating system compare with version 8.1, and what to do if you’re getting text messages on your iPad but not your iPhone.
docs.snippet: A look at how the new features in Microsoft’s latest operating system compare with version 8.1, and what to do if you’re getting text messages on your iPad but not your iPhone.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Should I update to Windows 10 now that I’ve gotten used to Windows 8.1? How big a change is it?
